question: In the reaction between moist SO₂ and acidified permanganate solution :
choices: SO₂ is oxidised to SO₄²⁻ and MnO₄⁻ is reduced to Mn²⁺
SO₂ is reduced to S and MnO₄⁻ is oxidised to MnO₄
SO₂ is oxidised to SO₃²⁻ and MnO₄⁻ is reduced to MnO₂
SO₂ is reduced to H₂S and MnO₄⁻ is oxidised to MnO₄
explanation: Sulphur dioxide is oxidised to Sulphate (SO₄²⁻).
